metadata.title: CVE-2022-45152 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A blind Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability was found inMoodle. This flaw exists due to insufficient validation of user-suppliedinput in LTI provider library. The library does not utilise Moodle'sinbuilt cURL helper, which resulted in a blind SSRF risk. An attacker cansend a specially crafted HTTP request and trick the application to initiaterequests to arbitrary systems. This vulnerability allows a remote attackerto perform SSRF attacks.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
